sentences.en: A bank is often selling an intangible or an idea.
sentences.cn: 银行经常出售一种无形产品或者一种观念.

sentences.en: Agricultural products brand is an important agricultural intangible asset.
sentences.cn: 农产品品牌是一项重要的农业无形资产.

sentences.en: Article 19 Intangible assets with uncertain service life may not be amortized.
sentences.cn: 第十九条使用寿命不确定的无形资产不应摊销.

sentences.en: Intangible assets include goodwill, patents, trademarks, copyrights, and franchise.
sentences.cn: 无形资产包括商誉 、 专利权 、 商标 、 版权, 以及专营权.

sentences.en: intangible assets such as customer goodwill
sentences.cn: 诸如顾客信誉之类的无形资产

sentences.en: It was vague , intangible , appealing only to some strange, nameless sixth sense.
sentences.cn: 这桩事是虚无缥缈 、 不可捉摸的, 只有通过什么不可思议, 难以名状的第六感觉才会领会.

sentences.en: It was vague, intangible, appeling only to some strange, nameless sixth sense.
sentences.cn: 这桩事是虚无漂缈 、 不可捉摸的,只有通过什么不可思议, 难以名状的第六感觉才会领会.

sentences.en: Stocks and bonds are intangible property.
sentences.cn: 股票和证券是无形财产.

sentences.en: The angular frangible girl is entangled in intangible triangle love.
sentences.cn: 骨瘦如柴的脆弱女孩被无形的三角恋爱缠住.

sentences.en: The island has an intangible quality of holiness.
sentences.cn: 该岛屿有一种难以形容的神圣感。
我们这个岛令人莫测高深, 是不可侵犯的.

sentences.en: The old building had an intangible air of sadness about it.
sentences.cn: 那座旧建筑笼罩着一种说不出的悲凉气氛。

sentences.en: The old building had an intangible air of sadness about it.
sentences.cn: 那座古老建筑物周围笼罩着说不出的凄凉气氛.

sentences.en: There are intangible benefits beyond a rise in the share price.
sentences.cn: 除股价上升之外还有无形利益。

sentences.en: This decision may give predominant weight to a single intangible.
sentences.cn: 这样的决策可能给无形的因素以很大的影响力.

sentences.en: Unlike specific labor, abstract labor is intangible and cannot be measured.
sentences.cn: 抽象劳动不同于具体劳动那样可视可量.

words.tran_cn: 无形的，触摸不到的；难以理解的

phrases.tran_cn: 有形和无形资产；有形资产和无形资产

trans.tran_cn: 触不到的，难以理解的，无法确定的
trans.tran_en: an intangible quality or feeling is difficult to describe exactly
